import React,{ Component, useState } from 'react' import {v4 as uid} from 'uuid' import './App.css' import TodoList from "./components/TodoList.js" function App () { const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() setInputText[{id:uid, title:inputText, checkbox:false, notes:''}] setInputText('')} const [inputText,setInputText] = useState([]) return (
setInputText(event.target.value)} />
{inputText}
) } export default App
